pages.text: Dungeons and a few other structures can contain valuable loot. See the following pages of this chapter to learn more about the loot that can be found in various objects inside dungeons. Sometimes, even valuable trinkets.

pages.title: Pots
pages.text: Old pots often are scattered inside dungeons, and can be smashed to drop mundane loot. Some drops, however, are incredibly valuable. Indeed, sometimes these pots can drop very rare relics or components. See the next page for more.

Chests can sometimes be found inside dungeons, and can contain some quite valuable loot. Based on my observations, chests have a higher chance of containing entire ingots and rarer materials, and even relics.
pages.title: Chests

pages.text: Moonspawns and other common monsters can drop some relatively good loot. These include living essence, crystillium ingots or nuggets, or sometimes maybe moon crystals or bloodstone shards from some types of skeletons.
pages.title: Monsters
